description: There’s more romance to go around -- both making out, kissing, hugging, and working up to having hot awesome sex -- and there are more guys now than ever before in the movie to express their bodies! Watch D.O., Vito Gallo, Mitchell Rock, Rafael Carreras, Alex Marte, Will Helm, Tony Axel, Jonathan Agassi, Harry Louis, Rio Silver, Rafael Alencar, Joseph Mercier, Brandon Jones, Edji Da Silva, Adrian Long, and Tate Ryder!
title: D.O. and Vito Gallo Explore the Rougher Side of Romance
